page.title: 13Settlements-Woolmer Hill
page.content: the other third shop frequently on a local basis. 50% of the people we interviewed felt that Haslemere was quite adequate for more expensive items. Many people in{Haslemere}like to go to the cinema and some of these like to go to the{West End}in London. Many people stay in Britain for their hoildays, especially those with caravans. 19% visit the continent, but hardly anyone travelled to places further afield. Recreational activities seemed to be popular; with 46% using the facilities at{Haslemere,}28% visiting{Guildford} and 7% preferring{Petersfield.}
